# Nelexa\GPlay\Model\HistogramRating::__construct
`Nelexa\GPlay\Model\HistogramRating::__construct` â€” Creates an object with information about the rating of Android applications from the Google Play store.

## Description
```php
Nelexa\GPlay\Model\HistogramRating::__construct ( int $fiveStars , int $fourStars , int $threeStars , int $twoStars , int $oneStar )
```

## Parameters
* **$fiveStars** (int)  
five star app rating
* **$fourStars** (int)  
four star app rating
* **$threeStars** (int)  
three star app rating
* **$twoStars** (int)  
two star app rating
* **$oneStar** (int)  
one star app rating

## Return Values
No value is returned.
